thread.title: Disney CEO Reveals Opening Date For Animal Kingdom's World Of Avatar
thread.title_full: Disney CEO Reveals Opening Date For Animal Kingdom's World Of Avatar

author: Charlie Ridgely
title: Disney CEO Reveals Opening Date For Animal Kingdom's World Of Avatar

organizations.name: animal kingdom's world of avatar disney

text:
Disney CEO Reveals Opening Date For Animal Kingdom's World Of Avatar Charlie Ridgely Start Photo Gallery Back to Article Image of 
Disney is one of the biggest companies in the entire world, and they just continue to grow year after year. 
In addition to adding a ton of Marvel and Star Wars properties to the parks - including an entire Star Wars park in 2019 - Disney is currently turning a section of Animal Kingdom in the colorful planet from Avatar . 
Pandora - The World Of Avatar, has been under construction for some time now, but Bob Iger has finally confirmed the official opening of the new set of attractions. 
Pandora will officially be open to the public on May 27, 2017. 
Along with the announcement, Disney's official blog released this description of the new world: This new land will transport guests to the visually stunning world of Pandora. Here, guests will wonder at floating mountains and bioluminescent plants, and can join the Na’vi on two excursions that take adventure to the next level. First, the family friendly Na’vi River Journey will send guests through a bioluminescent rainforest. Their journey will end in an unforgettable encounter with a Na’vi Shaman, a figure who has a deep connection to the life force of Pandora. And second, Avatar Flight of Passage will offer guests the jaw-dropping experience of exploring the world of Pandora atop a Banshee. Guests will also be able to dine at Satu’li Canteen, grab a drink at Pongu Pongu or shop for Na’vi cultural items, toys, science kits, and more at Windtraders.
